1.title: Southern Belles vs. City Slickers
1.plot: The small town Sourbeer Family goes up against the big city Arceneaux Family in the ultimate test of family bonds, as they compete for $25,000. Can the family members endure pies-in-the-face, the Pain-in-the-Butt Chair, snakes, scorpions...and each other...while stuck in a room together for two days? Or will the Black Sheep of the Family be all it takes to drive someone to hit the Escape Button?

2.title: Suburbian Schneiders vs. Country Crabtrees
2.plot: For some people, spending quality time with their families can be downright torturous! RELATIVE INSANITY challenges real families to work beyond their issues by coming together and competing for a cash prize of $25,000. Each week, two families, housed in separate living quarters, are locked together for two days, during which they attempt to outlast and outfox their neighbors by earning the most money through a series of physical challenges, spirited games and controversial family decisions. Unaware of how much money the other group has collected, each family will be ...

imdb.title: Relative Insanity
plot: _Relative Insanity_ (qv) on Lifetime takes family togetherness to the extreme in this fun, unpredictable game show. Two dysfunctional families, each trapped in a house, try to outlast the other for a cash prize.
